post.title: AniManGaki 2022 to Showcase 80 Malaysian VTubers
post.content:
The annual AniManGaki convention is back in action, and it brings a newly-launched section on VTubers. A total of 80 Malaysian VTubers, independent and agency-affiliated, will be featured in this year's event.

#AMG2022 Our newly launched section opens with the biggest gathering of Malaysian Vtubers -- 80 of them to be precise! Yes, this is a huge level up from Jom Cosplay! Come check them out and...#MyVT #MyVtuber #MalaysiaVtuber
(1/3) pic.twitter.com/mO4rdTkujl

— AniManGaki #AMG2022 (@animangaki) August 18, 2022

...find them all on the Upper Mezzanine floor of AniManGaki 2022.

This section is curated by @psy8_media
(2/3) pic.twitter.com/vsJk8kGKuW

— AniManGaki #AMG2022 (@animangaki) August 18, 2022

#MIECC #VideoGames #ACGEventMalaysia #CosplayEvent #Ticket #MalaysiaEvent #TheMines
(3/3) pic.twitter.com/gHn9y4WbB3

— AniManGaki #AMG2022 (@animangaki) August 18, 2022

Featured VTubers include Aetheria Project's Oumiya Emma, Phase Connect's Remilia Nephys, Live2D artist Momoiro Kohi, Sushiya, and Valyria Starfire.

This VTuber Showcase will happen at the Upper Mezzanine Floor of AniManGaki 2022 inside Mines International Exhibition Centre, Selangor, Malaysia on the weekend of August 27-28. Tickets are available at animangaki.com.

Photo from AniManGaki Twitter

node.description: Slime alien VTuber and Kawa colleague PiaPi Yuefo shares her experience at the recent Nijisanji EN Animate Cafe collaboration.
